Posts.Content: May 16, 2013 06:43PM Paintingmywaythru wrote: I know this thread is old but today I noticed my breast that I had cancer in 2 years ago in May, and had a lumpectomy and radiation on, is all red and brusied especially along the lower crease of the breast. I just saw the oncologist a week ago for a check up and all my bloods were good. I was doing some weird stretching exercises yesterday and yard work inthe sun but gosh this is weird. Just writing as it makes me anxious.

I guess I call my PCP in the AM- am afraid of a clot but no pain...
